DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FINAL ; SPOTLIGHT ; PLAY WAS GOLDEN
DOC.TEXT: The World Cup Golden Ball Award , presented to the outstanding player of the tournament as voted by more_than 1 # 000 members of the international press , went_to Romario of Brazil . He had more_than 2 # 400 points , well ahead of Italy ' s Baggio , who was second with 1 # 500 and received the Silver Ball , and Bronze Ball winner Hristo Stoitchkov of Bulgaria . BILL DWYRE
